page.title: 18Mount Zion Methodist Church
page.content: Mount Zion Methodist Church is situated in Chapel Street near the centre of Donisthorpe. On Sunday there are two services. There is also a Sunday School which takes place in a room next to the church and starts at 10 o'clock finishing at 11 o'clock.At Sunday School 2 hymns are sung, bible stories are told and sometimes craft work is done or plays are acted.A prayer is said before leaving. Once a year, in April, there is a Sunday School Anniversary. Parents come to listen to singing, poems and plays. There are 3 performances; morning, afternoon and evening. There are 2 trips organised each year to a theatre, famous building e.g. Warwick Castle or there are long walks and picnics. There is an Autumn Fair to raise money and a party at Christmas.
